Review: pathetic. Wheel is not working well. Wheel is also very hard to press (to open the link in new window)... Now I use the wheel just to scroll. Usage of wheel as an alternate of Open in New Window is much difficult.
Review: small in size. so grip in your palm will not be very comfortable.otherwise good product.
Review: Not able to hold it properly in hand and wire is also too short. I recommend to buy other larger size mouse with slightly more cost
Review: very bad. The mouse is small for my palm. It is difficult to click. especially double clicks. The click buttons are not very responsive.
Review: Defective product. not able to print a single page. Carriage struck in the sides of the printer loudly. Now I have to contact HP service. Very painful process
Review: Very expensive. Cartridge is very expensive....not recommended to buy this product .
Review: Average product. too bad for pc users.
Review: Utterly useless printer... TOTALLY unexpected from HP.. Pages getting stuck repeatedly. cartridge issues. abnormal noise.. Not worth even at 90% discount.
Review: starsExcellent Product and Service by Amazon and Seller.
Review: starsGood product but not able to login to Facetime.
Review: Very good product. Perfectly packed & delivered on time. Working good till now.
Review: One of the Best MacBook from Apple. Thanks to Amazon for fastest delivery and very Competetive Price.
Review: There is no comparison for apple product. Performance is beyond expectation. Customer service is awesome!! loved it.
Review: Works great sound is clear and is really loud. Would recommend
Review: This is a awesome product. My husband and I love it.
Review: Love the sound that comes out and Alexa is very informative!
Review: great device to listen to music.best blue tooth on the market today.I highly recommend it
Review: Excellent product at this price.The performance n battery life is superb for the whole day.Best buy. these days you don't get a compact good performing laptop at this price.

Review: As everyone knows any Apple product is outstanding and superior to the rest. Its superb. fast and amazing.I recommend buying the AirCase MacBook sleeve ( black and green ) and the MOCA smooth touch battle hard shell skin cover ( grey colour ). Both these products are on amazon.in. both VERY GOOD and must buy products to help improve your MacBook Air experience. ( I do not advertise or sell these products btw)

Review: The product is what it is and there is nothing to review about its capabilities. I wanted a MacBook and after looking at multiple outlets for prices amazon had the best pricing for this product. (With offers combined).I ordered the product on prime and there was a deficit on stock and by that delayed my delivery by a couple of days. Other than that the product was as expected. Delivery was smooth and as expected. The retailer is Appario retail and to my knowledge is an amazon subsidiary.
Review: Nice Product! Have been using it since for last 3 months now. No issues faced.
Review: Its really amazing. Exactly the same experience which I heard and described.Macbook air is really best and affordable to all in broad range of costly apple products...!!

Review: TSimply amazing! The best ever battery backup! High performance. And not to forget amazon packing and safety for your product is incredible. Love the way they care for your product by the time it reach safe in your hands.
Review: Got it safe.....when i ordered i was tensed as ....i thgt it might have cracks....but amazing product....thanku apple...thanku .....amazon....thnku for the best courier service
Review: Don't want to mention anything for apple MAC book :) Super product
Review: Always apple is the best product.build quality and software works together.u can’t use this one for media purposes.its one time investment for office use.

Review: excellent product with good exchange price... I like product and service
Review: What a fine piece of design and engineering! If you can get this. DO GET IT.

Review: was looking for a light laptop for multimedia use. perfect travel companion. as I was already using iOS ecosystem. was nt tough to shift from windows to apple.
Review: Best rate got from market value for money great quality
